titles.title: Monica Kristina Rodriguez Pier Safety Study
To conduct a study regarding the improvement of pier safety standards in navigable waters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/7/2002--Introduced. Monica Kristina Rodriguez Pier Safety Study - Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to conduct a study to improve pier safety standards in navigable waters. Requires the Secretary to submit a report on the study's findings to appropriate Congressional committees.
